mapper.update:
update MC_MODEL_TB
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ALARM_LEVEL = #{alarmLevel,jdbcType=CHAR},
DS_ID = #{dsId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
RELATING_ID = #{relatingId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MODEL_TYPE = #{modelType,jdbcType=CHAR},
MODEL_CHECK_WAY = #{modelCheckWay,jdbcType=CHAR},
MODEL_DATA_CHECK_WAY = #{modelDataCheckWay,jdbcType=CHAR},
TABLE_ID = #{tableId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
GROUP_ID = #{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
GROUP_NO = #{groupNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PRIVNAME = #{privname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FOLDERID = #{folderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXHI_REL_ID = #{exhiRelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MESSAGE_GROUPID = #{messageGroupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISSAVE = #{issave,jdbcType=CHAR},
ISCOMPUTER = #{iscomputer,jdbcType=CHAR},
TODATE_DEL = #{todateDel,jdbcType=CHAR},
HISDATA_DAYS = #{hisdataDays,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEALTYPE = #{dealtype,jdbcType=CHAR},
NOTICETYPE = #{noticetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
COST = #{cost,jdbcType=INTEGER},
EXCTYPE = #{exctype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ONEDAY = #{oneday,jdbcType=CHAR},
STARTDAY = #{startday,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENDDAY = #{endday,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISMAIL = #{ismail,jdbcType=CHAR},
ISSMS = #{issms,jdbcType=CHAR},
SHOW_NAME = #{showName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SELECT_CONDITION = #{selectCondition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_CUR_MODEL = #{isCurModel,jdbcType=CHAR},
IS_AUTO_YJ = #{isAutoYj,jdbcType=CHAR},
AUTO_YJ_PARAM = #{autoYjParam,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISAUTOSUPERVISE = #{isautosupervise,jdbcType=CHAR},
DETAIL_TYPE = #{detailType,jdbcType=CHAR},
MODEL_BUSI_TYPE = #{modelBusiType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRAD_BUSI = #{modelBusiType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FILTER_TYPE = #{filterType,jdbcType=CHAR},
ISFINANCE = #{isFinance,jdbcType=CHAR},
BUSI_NO = #{busiNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
FEEDBACK_DAYS = #{feedbackDays,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update MC_MODEL_TB set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ALARM_LEVEL = #{alarmLevel,jdbcType=CHAR}, DS_ID = #{dsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RELATING_ID = #{relatingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MODEL_TYPE = #{modelType,jdbcType=CHAR}, MODEL_CHECK_WAY = #{modelCheckWay,jdbcType=CHAR}, MODEL_DATA_CHECK_WAY = #{modelDataCheckWay,jdbcType=CHAR}, TABLE_ID = #{tableId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, GROUP_ID = #{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, GROUP_NO = #{groupNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PRIVNAME = #{privname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FOLDERID = #{folderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXHI_REL_ID = #{exhiRelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MESSAGE_GROUPID = #{messageGroupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISSAVE = #{issave,jdbcType=CHAR}, ISCOMPUTER = #{iscomputer,jdbcType=CHAR}, TODATE_DEL = #{todateDel,jdbcType=CHAR}, HISDATA_DAYS = #{hisdataDays,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEALTYPE = #{dealtype,jdbcType=CHAR}, NOTICETYPE = #{noticetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, COST = #{cost,jdbcType=INTEGER}, EXCTYPE = #{exctype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ONEDAY = #{oneday,jdbcType=CHAR}, STARTDAY = #{startday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENDDAY = #{endday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISMAIL = #{ismail,jdbcType=CHAR}, ISSMS = #{issms,jdbcType=CHAR}, SHOW_NAME = #{showName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SELECT_CONDITION = #{selectCondition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_CUR_MODEL = #{isCurModel,jdbcType=CHAR}, IS_AUTO_YJ = #{isAutoYj,jdbcType=CHAR}, AUTO_YJ_PARAM = #{autoYjParam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISAUTOSUPERVISE = #{isautosupervise,jdbcType=CHAR}, DETAIL_TYPE = #{detailType,jdbcType=CHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM MC_MODEL_TB WHERE STATUS='1' AND MODEL_TYPE=#{modelType,jdbcType=CHAR} order by name

SELECT
FROM MC_MODEL_TB ORDER BY NAME

SELECT
FROM MC_MODEL_TB WHERE MODEL_TYPE='0' AND IS_CUR_MODEL = '1' ORDER BY ID

SELECT M.ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, ALARM_LEVEL, M.DS_ID, RELATING_ID, MODEL_TYPE, MODEL_CHECK_WAY, MODEL_DATA_CHECK_WAY, TABLE_ID, GROUP_ID, GROUP_NO, PRIVNAME, FOLDERID, EXHI_REL_ID, MESSAGE_GROUPID, ISSAVE, ISCOMPUTER, TODATE_DEL, HISDATA_DAYS, DEALTYPE, NOTICETYPE, STATUS, COST, EXCTYPE, ONEDAY, STARTDAY, ENDDAY, ISMAIL, ISSMS, SHOW_NAME, SELECT_CONDITION, IS_CUR_MODEL, IS_AUTO_YJ, AUTO_YJ_PARAM, ISAUTOSUPERVISE, DETAIL_TYPE, TRAD_BUSI, TABLE_NAME, BUSI_NO, FEEDBACK_DAYS from MC_MODEL_TB M,MC_TABLE_TB T WHERE M.TABLE_ID = T.ID AND M.ID = #{modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT BUSI_NO,BUSI_NAME FROM SM_BUSI_TYPE_TB ORDER BY BUSI_ORDER

select model_id from sm_user_model_tb where role_no in(select role_no from sm_user_role_tb where user_no=#{userNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) union select to_char(id) model_id from mc_model_tb where busi_no in(select busi_no from sm_user_busi_tb where user_no=#{userNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

SELECT
FROM MC_MODEL_TB WHERE GROUP_ID IN (SELECT GROUP_ID FROM MC_MODEL_TB WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}) AND GROUP_ID<>0 AND STATUS=1 ORDER BY GROUP_NO

select busi_no value,busi_name name from sm_busi_type_tb where busi_no in (select distinct (TRAD_BUSI) from MC_MODEL_TB WHERE ID IN (SELECT MODEL_ID FROM MC_ORGAN_MODEL_TB WHERE ORGAN_NO = #{userOrganNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
AND ID in
#{modelIdMap.MODEL_ID}
AND STATUS = '1' AND DETAIL_TYPE = 0 AND MODEL_TYPE = '0') order by busi_no
